main.description: I am a Principal Consultant at Infinitive with a strong passion for technology.
main.bio: Adam is a technology consultant passionate about technology. He is currently working as a Principal Consultant at Infinitive within the Data Science competency group. He has a strong interest in cloud computing, web development, and data analytics. Adam plans to pursue his Masterâ€™s in Computer Science in the Fall of 2022.
